about_the_game:
About

In the sprawling megacity of Sydney3, a young detective becomes the unwilling host of a parasitic gauntlet and gains the power to fight back against the growing threat spreading through the lower levels.

Everyone has a plan for Sydney3… As Klo, you must adapt to your new bond with Samurai Unicorn, venture into VRmin-infested locations to uncover Goliath’s secrets, and hunt down the Dream Eaters that are invading the city.

With a diverse range of characters all fighting for the future of Sydney3, the story of Samurai Unicorn will be an engaging saga of mystery and rising action as Klo struggles against the many enemies standing in her way.

Features

Take aim with an arsenal of S3PF issued weapons.

Embrace the power of the parasitic gauntlet to deliver devastating melee attacks.

Face off against monstrous Dream Eaters in challenging boss fights as Samurai Unicorn and acquire new abilities.

Explore intimately crafted hub areas and get to know the people of Sydney3.
Retro-styled graphics that bring low-poly models and pixel textures into the modern age.

Highly reactive enemies that respond differently based on where they are shot, with limb dismemberment that changes the way they can attack.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2 GB Video RAM
